column2: "We've finally been given permission to investigate more of Naberius."
"We've only checked a small part of the planet so far, but it seems a more thorough investigation is in order. This is a special case though, so we're on our own."
"Well since we're only going to a place we've been cleared for, we should be fine."
"Other than that, enjoy yourself. We're here to uncover this planet's secrets."
"I'm sure we'll find something. Wait for me there, would you?"
